abstract: Take one splatter-painted invitation. Add a news blackout. Enter reality-distortion field. The result? More hype about a mystery product. Genius.
snippet: Take one splatter-painted invitation. Add a news blackout. Enter reality-distortion field. The result? More hype about a mystery product. Genius.
lead_paragraph: Moments after Apple sent an invitation to journalists on Monday in advance of an event next week, the invitation itself came under the kind of intense scrutiny that was once seen only when a new photo emerged of the Kremlin’s leadership.
